title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.10 - Administrative penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.10 - Administrative penalties

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner may revoke any or all
dealer demonstrator registration numbers issued to a dealer for improper use of
such numbers. (b) The commissioner
may revoke or suspend a snowmobile dealer registration for: (1)
a false statement made in the application
for such registration; (2)
permitting use of demonstrator registration numbers contrary to law; (3)
fraud or fraudulent practices; (4)
deceptive or misleading
advertising; (5)
failure to comply
with article 47 of the Vehicle and Traffic Law or these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
107.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
